name: Bitgem Hover Girls
description:
BITGEM Hover Girls:

How to Play: Be the 1st to cross the finish line to win!
1 - 4 players can play at once / best played with an xbox 360 controller for multiplayer!

Game controls
xbox 360 controller:
left stick - move left / right
a button / right trigger - go

keyboard controls:
Player1: up arrow - go | left/right arrow - move left/right
player2: z/e - go | q - move left | d - move right
player3: t/y - go | f - move left | h - move right
player4: o/i - go | j - move left | l - move right

Unity Assets Used:

  • Highroad Engine (Racing Engine)
  • BITGEM Volleyball Girls (Character Models)
  • BITGEM Low Poly City Set (Level Models)
  • BITGEM Karate Set (Level Models)
  • Toon Gunner Character - Low Poly (Hoverboard)
  • Musics by Smartsound  
    • Felt not Heard (Main Theme)
    • Fresh Breeze (Race Track 1 Theme)
    • Hello Nighttime (Race Track 3 Theme)
    • Spice is Nice (Race Track 2 Theme)
